title: Voice Announcer/ How Do I Change it?
body:
Been trying all morning to change it, looking up guides ect. But there is no Oceanic Guide to doing it. Im probably doing something wrong. If anyone could give me some pointers/guides I would love that so much.
{{champion:119}}

replies.body: HORSE OF FORCE already explained the most simplest way. The Blakinola Announcer change worked well with me when I changed the files.

Firstly, editing the way the game functions is a break of the EULA. If you're found out to be tampering with the game's files then your account will be banned. Just so you're aware.

Not that I'd be endorsing this or anything, but you might want to check out the path "lol_game_client_en_au/managedfiles/0.0.0Â­.90".

For [Blakinola's voice pack](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3IRTi6dbvxs) specifically, check out [these instructions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pQIOhoRd5ITA-ggl9wNf7Ya4jDXJewNVGBDrsH8N6lQ/edit).

Or if you knew how Riot package their sound files, then you could probably make some voice-packs of your own.
